Premise: The official UN definition of the word 'genocide' includes imposing measures intended to prevent births within the group and forcibly transferring children of the group to another group. Conclusion: We should stop mass migration.
Premise: Organizing, promoting, directing and financing mass migration is a crime against humanity.

Conclusion: We should rethink the legal state of Family Reunification.
Premise: Illegal loopholes in the legislation are enabling illegal migration. Family Reunification has been and remains the biggest channel of migration into the EU.

Conclusion: We should stop the European Commission’s Ideological bias toward migration.
Premise: The European Commission’sportrays migration as an opportunity only, a Fatality that cannot be stopped, and the only solution against aging.

Conclusion: We should introduce digital identity authentication on social media that has more than 100,000 users
Premise: Anonymity is at least as much as important as Identity.  Today it is very easy to be anonymous, but hard to prove the identity of opinion and establish a public web of trust.  Anonymity enables powerful identities to control the messages, and therefore the identity-seeking masses.

Conclusion: We should shift the EU policy toward the Russian Federation
Premise: Belarus, Russia, and Ukraine are by far the most important neighbors of the EU. A good relationship with all three is very desirable for the EU. For that, we would have to be willing to understand their history better.

Conclusion: We should shift the EU policy toward the Russian Federation
Premise: The Russian Federation is our neighbor. We share common historic and cultural ties with them. Today the EU confronts Russia with sanctions. An understandable reaction to its actions in Ukraine and failing democracy. Let us not forget actions done by others (US intervention in Iraq, the Chinese in Tibet and their treatment of minorities, etc.). Yet we close our eyes.

Conclusion: We should abolish the 996 overtime system
Premise: For the poor people, if they can go to the Internet factory, China's 996 overtime system is a blessing, twelve hours a day, six days a week, can also rest a day, quite good.

Conclusion: We should restrict minors from playing online games.
Premise: Students who do not learn well are more likely to indulge in games. They cannot find a sense of accomplishment in real life.

Conclusion: We should crack down on unreasonably high incomes.
Premise: It is more important to raise the income of the lower class in the distribution system and to lower the cost of living of the lower and middle class than to fight against high income.
